function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SAR-CoV-2 in densely populated urban areas","Impact":"Increase in COVID-19 cases and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures, mask mandates, and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Urban populations","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of empirical evidence for the role of urban nature in pandemic resilience","Impact":"Uncertainty in the effectiveness of green spaces in pandemic response","Mitigation":"Conducting research studies to gather empirical evidence, data collection on green space usage","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, remote sensing technologies","People":"Research institutions, urban planning agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Risks associated with increased demand for recreational activity in green spaces","Impact":"Potential overuse and degradation of green spaces, strain on park infrastructure and services","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable management plans, public education on responsible recreational practices","Technologies":"GIS mapping tools, crowd monitoring systems","People":"Park management organizations, recreational users","Owner":"Park management organizations, local governments"}]}
